Improvements.Description: Java 8 introduced Objects.isNull() and Objects.nonNull() methods which makes the null check more expressive and improves code readability.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Set instead of List for checking duplicates
Improvements.Description: Using a Set over a List for storing and checking duplicates is more efficient, as add and contains operations in a HashSet are O(1), while in an ArrayList they are O(n).

Improvements.Change_Diff: Not applicable, as there are no resources that need to be closed in the provided code.
Improvements.Description: The try-with-resources statement ensures that each resource is closed at the end of the statement. It improves code readability and avoids potential resource leaks.
